SELECT WORK_PATTERN.WORK_PATTERN_ID , WORK_PATTERN.GID , WORK_PATTERN.EVENT_KIND , WORK_PATTERN.MS_VESSEL_ID , WORK_PATTERN.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , WORK_PATTERN.WORK_DATE , WORK_PATTERN.WORK_DATE_DIFF , WORK_PATTERN.WORK_CONTENT_ID , WORK_PATTERN.DELETE_FLAG, WORK_PATTERN.RENEW_DATE, WORK_PATTERN.RENEW_USER_ID, WORK_PATTERN.DATA_NO, WORK_PATTERN.TS
FROM WORK_PATTERN
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO WORK_PATTERN ( WORK_PATTERN_ID, GID, EVENT_KIND, MS_VESSEL_ID, MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID, WORK_DATE, WORK_DATE_DIFF, WORK_CONTENT_ID, DELETE_FLAG, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, DATA_NO, TS ) VALUES ( nextval('SEQ_WORK_PATTERN_ID'), :GID, :EVENT_KIND, :MS_VESSEL_ID, :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID, :WORK_DATE, :WORK_DATE_DIFF, :WORK_CONTENT_ID, :DELETE_FLAG, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :DATA_NO, :TS )

UPDATE WORK_PATTERN SET GID = :GID, EVENT_KIND = :EVENT_KIND, MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID, MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID, WORK_DATE = :WORK_DATE, WORK_DATE_DIFF = :WORK_DATE_DIFF, WORK_CONTENT_ID = :WORK_CONTENT_ID, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID, TS = :TS
WHERE WORK_PATTERN_ID = :WORK_PATTERN_ID

UPDATE WORK_PATTERN SET DELETE_FLAG = 1, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID
WHERE GID = :GID
